pages.color_to_bw_title: Convert Image to Black and White Online - Free B&W Filter
pages.color_to_bw_desc: Instantly convert color photos to black and white (grayscale) for free. Best online image to bw converter. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP. No sign-up required. Save 60% on printing costs.
pages.coloring_desc: Transform any photo into a coloring page with our line art generator. Parents and teachers love it for creating custom coloring activities for kids.
pages.invert_desc: Create negative images by inverting all colors. Useful for special effects, design projects, and artistic expression.

formats.jpg_intro: JPG (or JPEG) is one of the most widely used image formats. Our converter maintains image quality while removing color information, perfect for photos and complex images.
formats.jpg_feature_1: Most compatible format across all devices
formats.jpg_feature_2: Best for photographs and detailed images
formats.png_intro: PNG format supports transparency and lossless compression. When converting PNG to black and white, you can choose to preserve or remove transparency.
formats.png_feature_3: Perfect for logos and graphics with transparency
formats.webp_intro: WebP is a modern image format that provides superior compression. Converting WebP to black and white reduces file size even further.
formats.webp_feature_3: Smaller file sizes than JPG or PNG
formats.heic_intro: HEIC is Apple's efficient image format used by default on iPhones. Our tool automatically converts HEIC files for processing.
formats.heic_feature_1: Default format on iPhone and iPad

what.title: What is MakeBW?
what.desc: Looking for a free color to black and white converter? MakeBW is the best online black and white maker that processes images instantly in your browser. Whether you want to turn a photo into a coloring page or learn how to convert image to black and white for printing, our tool handles it all securely.
what.feature_1_desc: Convert color photos to classic black and white, save printing costs, create artistic effects.
what.feature_2_desc: Extract line art from any photo to create printable coloring pages for kids.
what.feature_3_desc: Create negative effects for special designs and artistic creation.

how.title: How It Works?
how.subtitle: Just 4 steps to complete image conversion. No registration, no installation required.
how.step_1_desc: Drag and drop or click to select your image. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, HEIC formats.
how.step_2_desc: Select conversion mode: grayscale, coloring page line art, or color inversion.
how.step_3_desc: Adjust line thickness or other parameters as needed, preview in real-time.
how.step_4_desc: Choose PNG or JPG format and download for use or printing.

why.reason_2_desc: No waiting for uploads or downloads, conversion happens in milliseconds. Real-time preview, see results immediately.
why.reason_3_desc: No registration, no payment, no limits. Professional tools, free forever.
why.reason_4_desc: Desktop, tablet, or mobile. Supports all modern browsers, process images anywhere.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Learn more about converting images to black and white
faq.q1: How to convert image to black and white?
faq.a1:
1. Upload your photo to MakeBW.
2. Choose 'Grayscale' mode or adjust the threshold slider.
3. Click Download. It's that simple! All processing happens in your browser, ensuring 100% privacy.
faq.a2: Yes, MakeBW is a free online color to black and white converter. No hidden fees, no watermarks, and no registration required.
faq.q3: Can I turn a photo into a coloring page?
faq.a3: Absolutely! Just select 'Coloring Page' mode. Our smart algorithm automatically extracts line art to create clear black and white coloring pages perfect for printing.
faq.a4: We support JPG, PNG, WebP, and HEIC (iPhone default). All formats can be processed instantly.
